title: Enjoy easy access to public transportation at Lincoln Terrace Apartments
posting_body: ['Lincoln Terrace Apartments', '25 E 5th Ave', 'Denver, CO 80203', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '2 Bedroom | 1 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '962 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1061', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Unit Includes:', '❖ Individual AC and Heat Control', '❖ Kitchen Appliances', '❖ Walk-In Closets', 'Property Description:', 'Currently fully leased, applications accepted for future availability.', 'Lincoln Terrace is the Tax Credit affordable apartment community in Baker District.', 'We are located right near the heart of downtown Denver, making this a great option for those who like the buzz of the city and the excitement it brings.', "To meet the needs of our renters, we've included many in-home features and community amenities to make living here an experience you'll remember.", 'Property Amenities:', '❖ Affordable Housing', '❖ Community Room', '❖ Controlled Access', '❖ Online Portal', '❖ Onsite Maintenance', '❖ Onsite Management', '❖ Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', '❖ Shopping Nearby', '❖ Trash Chutes', '❖ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '❖ 24-Hour Fitness Center with Free Weights', '❖ All Paid Utilities', '❖ Contactless Online Payment', '❖ Great Location in near Downtown Denver', '❖ Laundry Facility on Each Floor', '❖ Parking Garage', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Recycling Available', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'Lincoln Terrace Apartments is a cat friendly community, dogs are allowed if service animals.', 'We allow two (2) cats max per household.', '$25/pet pet rent.', '$200 pet deposit.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Proudly managed by Security Properties', 'This is an affordable community.', 'Income & student restrictions apply, please contact the leasing office for pricing, information and guidelines.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '883140D5319F448']
